casebody.data:
Friday, March 17, 1995

MOTION DOCKET

93-2432. No. 63692. Ohio Bur. of Workers’ Comp. v. Etheridge. Cuyahoga County,

This cause is pending before the court as an appeal from the Court of Appeals for Cuyahoga County. Upon consideration of appellee’s motion for continuance of oral argument currently scheduled for April 18, 1995,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion for continuance be, and hereby is, denied, effective March 15, 1995.
